rooms.description: Serves as the foyer with Vastu-compliant entrance facing north.
Large living area designed for natural light and ventilation. Windows face east to maximize morning sunlight.
Dining area integrated with the living room; features a balcony overlooking south side for ample natural light.
Modern kitchen designed to follow Vastu norms with ventilation and natural lighting from east windows.
Utility room including storage for cleaning supplies and a small pantry.

openings.description: Main entrance with an open corridor leading to the living area, designed for smooth flow of energy.
Spacious balcony adjacent to each bedroom on the first floor; designed for relaxation and natural light.
Two-car garage integrated with the ground floor, ensuring easy access to the home.
Sleek swimming pool designed for relaxation and fitness purposes, following Vastu principles.
